headline: Vertex Announces CASGEVY速 Reimbursement Agreement for the Treatment of Transfusion-Dependent Beta Thalassemia and Sickle Cell Disease in Italy
summary: LONDON, September 18, 2025--Vertex Pharmaceuticals (Nasdaq: VRTX) announced today a reimbursement agreement with the Italian Medicines Agency (AIFA) for eligible transfusion-dependent beta thalassemia (TDT) and severe sickle cell disease (SCD) patients to access the CRISPR/Cas9 gene-edited therapy, CASGEVY速 (exagamglogene autotemcel).
